name: 2021 2nd Symposium on Pattern Recognition and Applications
content: Publication and Indexing： Accepted full papers of SPRA 2021 will be published in the conference proceedings, which will be indexed by Scopus, Ei Compendex, etc. SPRA 2020 proceedings, ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-7762-1)，Scopus & Ei Compendex index.
